Parameters: Element: Element type for intputs and outputs
create(android.support.v8.renderscript.R.Description: Supported elements types are @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Element#U8_4_E@ The defaults tables are identity.

getKernelID().Description: Get a KernelID for this intrinsic kernel.

forEach(android.support.v8.renderscript..Description: Invoke the kernel and apply the lookup to each cell of ain and copy to aout.

setLUT(android.support.v8.renderscript.A.Description: Sets the @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Allocation_E@ to be used as the lookup table. The lookup table must use the same @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#Element_E@ as the intrinsic.

ScriptIntrinsic3DLUT(long, android.suppo.FullName: ScriptIntrinsic3DLUT (long id, RenderScript rs, Element e)

ClassDesc: Intrinsic for converting RGB to RGBA by using a 3D lookup table. The incoming r,g,b values are use as normalized x,y,z coordinates into a 3D allocation. The 8 nearest values are sampled and linearly interpolated. The result is placed in the output.
